content.html: I don't know how the UK Government pulled off to make working in tech for them both cool, impactful and useful. But they did. Transformed an unattractive industry for tech workers into... attractive? Non-tech-first companies should take note and copy. Perhaps even startups!
content.value:
I don't know how the UK Government pulled off to make working in tech for them both cool, impactful and useful. But they did. Transformed an unattractive industry for tech workers into... attractive?

Non-tech-first companies should take note and copy. Perhaps even startups!
